    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    age INTEGER,
    membership_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE services (
    service_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    customer_id INTEGER,
    preferred_therapist VARCHAR(50),
    preferred_service VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE spa_customers (
	customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	customer_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
	customer_phone VARCHAR(15) NULL
)

CREATE TABLE spa_appointments (
	appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT NOT NULL,
	appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
	appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
	service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT fk_customer_id FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES spa_customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE spa_services (
	service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	service_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	service_description TEXT NULL,
	service_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE spa_preferences (
	preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT NOT NULL,
	service_id INT NOT NULL,
	rating INT NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT fk_customer_id FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES spa_customers(customer_id),
	CONSTRAINT fk_service_id FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES spa_services(service_id)
)

CREATE TABLE spa_ratings (
	rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT NOT NULL,
	service_id INT NOT NULL,
	rating_value INT NOT NULL,
	review_comment TEXT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT fk_customer_id FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES spa_customers(customer_id),
	CONSTRAINT fk_service_id FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES spa_services(service_id)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE spa_customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
